Welcome to simple_math’s documentation!¶

A collection of simple math operations

simple_math.poly_first(x, a0, a1)¶

Calculates the y-value on a straight line following a linear equation: a0x+a1

Parameters
xint

x value of desired point

a0int

slope of the line

a1int

value where the line cuts the Y-axis

Returns
The Y-value of the linear equation
simple_math.poly_second(x, a0, a1, a2)¶

Calculates the Y value for a second grade polynomial with the following form: a2x² + c where c = a0x+a1

Parameters
xint

x value of the desired point

a0int
a1int
a2int
Returns
Y-value of the desire point on the second grade polynomial

Performs addition between a and b

aint
bint
Returns
int

Sum of a and b.
